attributes.action: pass a law that would apply retrospectively to make those MP's who made fraudulent expense claims face legal action for thier crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's make the laws. MP's acted within the spirit of the laws. NOT GOOD ENOUGH! The British people are victims of a crime carried out by the very people who should be protecting their interests. If confidence in government is ever to be restored we need to see these crooks charged for their crimes and believable sentences handed down to those found guilty

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
